DOC.brief_title: A Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics And Pharmacodynamics Study Of PF-06700841 , With Bioavailability/Food Effect Investigation
DOC.criteria: Key Inclusion Criteria Healthy Subject Cohorts : Healthy male subject and/or female subject nonchildbearing potential age 18 55 year , inclusive No evidence active latent inadequately treated infection Mycobacterium tuberculosis ( TB ) Key Inclusion Criteria Psoriasis Subject Cohorts : Male subject and/or female subject nonchildbearing potential diagnosis plaque psoriasis age 18 65 year , inclusive Have diagnosis plaque psoriasis least 6 month prior first study dose Key Exclusion Criteria Healthy Subject Cohorts : Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) Males childbearing potential unwilling unable use highly effective method contraception outline protocol duration study least 28 day last dose investigational product Key Exclusion Criteria Psoriasis Subject Cohorts : Currently non plaque form psoriasis , ( eg , erythrodermic , guttate , pustular psoriasis ) . Have current drug induce psoriasis , eg , new onset psoriasis exacerbation psoriasis beta blocker , calcium channel blocker , antimalarial drug lithium Males childbearing potential unwilling unable use highly effective method contraception outline protocol duration study least 28 day last dose investigational product
